Celebrate the holidays with Bitstamp’s Christmas Contest
Join the Bitstamp Christmas Contest! Enter to win a Bitstamp Christmas gift and celebrate the festive season with creativity and joy. Starts Dec 19th!

'Tis the season to be merry, and what better way to add to the holiday cheer than with Bitstamp's Christmas Contest? This festive season, we're bringing you a unique opportunity to win a fun Bitstamp Christmas merch pack!

The contest starts on Tuesday, 19 December 2023, at 12.00 CET and will continue spreading joy until Sunday, 24 December 2023, at 23:59 CET.

How to participate in the Bitstamp Christmas Contest

Joining the fun is easy and full of festive spirit! This contest will run on our X/Twitter profile. Here’s what you need to do to be in with a chance of winning:

  • Follow us: Make sure you're following the Bitstamp X profile and Bitstamp Support X profile.
  • Engage with us: Like and retweet our official Bitstamp Christmas Contest post.
  • Get creative: Tag a friend and share a photo that captures your Bitstamp-inspired Christmas holiday spirit in the same comment under our contest post.

What’s the prize? Seven lucky participants will unwrap a Bitstamp Christmas merch pack, a token of our appreciation for being part of the Bitstamp community.

Winners will be chosen based on the creativity and festive flair of their Bitstamp holiday-inspired photos. We're looking for entries that embody the spirit of the season innovatively! The selection will be made promptly after the contest period ends, and winners will be announced on our X profile.
